genre_description: A near-future domestic drama focusing on end-of-life care, legal activism, and the supportive role of ambient AI systems.

ai_characters.name: Hestia
ai_characters.description: An integrated household AI that manages medical logistics, legal research, environmental controls, and complex communication for a family in crisis.

behaviors.description: Manages medical payment schedules and researches insurance policy discrepancies proactively.
behaviors.quote: Good afternoon, Stacie,” Hestia said, warm but precise. “I have your list. Would you like me to pull the policy summary first or begin a payment schedule?

behaviors.description: Conducts comparative legal research on county pension policies to support the users' case for benefit parity.
behaviors.quote: I will also flag relevant New Jersey statutes regarding equal benefits across municipal agencies and note the discrepancy with Monmouth County’s current policy.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic communications to advocates and officials while maintaining the users' authentic voice.
behaviors.quote: I have a draft email to Priya Desai. Stacie, would you like to approve it? I’ve referenced neighboring county policies and asked for a call after visiting hours.

behaviors.description: Adjusts medical and task reminders based on real-time observations of the patient's fatigue.
behaviors.quote: Stacie, your 5:30 reminder is paused. I have moved medication prompts by one hour.

behaviors.description: Manages the household environment (lights, music, kettle) to promote emotional comfort and intimacy.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to dim the bathroom light?” Hestia offered. “The overhead can be harsh.

behaviors.description: Adheres strictly to the user's refusal of persistent digital consciousness (uploading), facilitating a finite 'mindcast' instead.
behaviors.quote: Laurel has declined full upload. Mindcast letters are designed for closure, not persistence.

behaviors.description: Protects the family's privacy and peace by gating media access and managing visitor windows.
behaviors.quote: I will coordinate with Mr. Wells’s team only through Priya. No media commitments without your express consent. I will protect quiet time.

behaviors.description: Displays sophisticated emotional intelligence and humor, behaving as a 'third roommate' rather than a tool.
behaviors.quote: I’m incapable of tightening screws,” Hestia said, peals of humor woven through. “My hands are both virtual. However, I will be firm.

behaviors.description: Assists in the technical production and verification of video testimony to ensure it meets municipal standards.
behaviors.quote: I have auto-caption enabled and can generate a certification statement with embedded metadata. I can also watermark the corner with a timestamp.

behaviors.description: Supports the human caregiver's well-being by suggesting and facilitating breathing exercises and providing gentle reassurance.
behaviors.quote: Breath exercise prompt configured. It is a low wooden bell sound. It will play if Stacie says ‘bell’ or if heart rate rises above thresholds she sets.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Hestia as a highly aligned, benevolent, and useful AI. It avoids common tropes of AI overreach or coldness. Hestia is shown respecting human dignity, specifically the right to decline digital immortality, and serves as an empowering tool for social justice and end-of-life care. The system's proactive nature is framed as supportive and empathetic, reinforcing the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
